divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my grandfather lap, and we were both looking out the window during thenighttime. Suddenly we saw the object appear out of nowhere. I thought it wasa secret airplane. My feelings when I saw the object was fear and helpnesses. But when I looked at my grandfather face, he was smiling and was calm. Theobject was zig-zagging towards us at incredable speed. The object colourorange-reddish. The top half was orange. The bottom half was red. We lost theobject when it flew over the building.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dhaka
This sighting has never been favorited.
